Summary: "Around the world in 60 minutes" cover up of UFOs by lens flare?
divs: sighting detailsi'm looking at some pictures of the video for "around the world in 60 minutes" shown on bbc 4 and it looks as though they use lens flare to cover up video of spacecraft. there are three orbs to start, then a ton of hexagonal lens flare goes all over the screen but the orbs only move a tiny amount and are not hexagonal and don't move at near the same speed with the rest of the "lens flare" they also do not move at the same angle. this site has some pictures: http:\\newsfeed.kosmograd.com\kosmograd\2011\03\shuttle-hexagon-lensflare.html didn't know who to tell or how to get others to look at it...
